content: That’s awesome since I saw you on Snapchat and Medium I jumped in the same train. Keeping a WP blog takes considerable admin time and a lot of time to distribute. Although there is an audience for every platform, Medium has the easiest way to get stories from contributors. Snapchat has great content if you follow those that share tips, unless you like to consume “Truman Show”-style of stories. Which can become boring watching someone eat or ramble about their day.
